product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Mountain Day Tripper First-Aid Kit
long_description: The Adventure Medical Kits Mountain Day Tripper first-aid kit packs all the essentials for 1 - 5 people for multiple days. All contents are packed together in easily identifiable, clear vinyl compartments; system organizes contents by injury type, saving valuable response time. Kit includes 11 precut, shaped Moleskin patches, 10cc irrigation syringe, 4 After Cuts & Scrapes(R) wipes, 2 alcohol swabs and 3 applications of triple antibiotic ointment. 4 butterfly closures, 3 knuckle bandages, 5 fabric bandages, 8 gauze pads, 2 non-adherent sterile dressings and 10 yards of 1 in. tape help you care for cuts and scrapes. Four 325mg aspirin tablets, six 200mg ibuprofen tablets, two 25mg antihistamine tablets and 2 Diamode tablets knock out pain, fever, allergy and upset stomach symptoms. Also includes 2 cotton tip applicators, a tincture of benzoin topical adhesive swab, 1 trauma pad and 1 pair of nitrile gloves. 1 elastic bandage with rip-and-stick closure and 2 safety pins help you care for a sprain or strain. Includes an AfterBite(R) sting and itch relief wipe and a pair of splinter/tick remover forceps. Included book, "A Comprehensive Guide to Wilderness and Travel Medicine," helps you recognize and treat injuries. Assembled in the USA of imported and domestic materials.
short_description: The Adventure Medical Kits Mountain Day Tripper first-aid kit packs all the essentials for 1 - 5 people for multiple days.
